name: parameter-arity-variance-is-not-correct
description: A comprehensive analysis and demonstration of TypeScript's parameter arity variance issues, featuring examples from real GitHub issues and a custom TypeScript compiler that enforces stricter parameter checking. Includes test cases for issues #13043, #16871, #17868, #20274, #20541, and #21868. Currently supports Windows only.

scripts.compare:13043: echo === Default TypeScript === & npm run tsc:13043 & echo === Custom TypeScript === & npm run transpile:13043
scripts.compare:16871: echo === Default TypeScript === & npm run tsc:16871 & echo === Custom TypeScript === & npm run transpile:16871
